pullRequest.title: [KOGITO-3460] Create native daily build
pullRequest.bodyText:
Job that clone and compiles all the repos in native mode
@radtriste @cristianonicolai

nodes.bodyText: do we have podman installed in the Jenkins slave machines? Docker is there for sure.

I think this should be a multibranch pipeline. Thus BRANCH_NAME is already provided as env by Jenkins.
parameters part can be deleted ;)

Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                         subject: "[${params.BRANCH_NAME}][d] Runtimes native",
          
          
            
                         subject: "[${env.BRANCH_NAME}][d] Runtimes native",

Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                    checkout(githubscm.resolveRepository(repoName, "kiegroup", params.BRANCH_NAME, false))
          
          
            
                    checkout(githubscm.resolveRepository(repoName, "kiegroup", env.BRANCH_NAME, false))
yeah right ... could be a problem on kie-rhel7 agent. We should use kogito-cloud instead

As mentioned by @cristianonicolai

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                    label 'kie-rhel7 && kie-mem16g'
          
          
            
                    label 'kogito-cloud'

Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                maven.runMavenWithSubmarineSettings("clean install ${env.MAVEN_EXTRA_ARGS} ${extraArgs}", false)
          
          
            
                maven.runMavenWithSubmarineSettings("clean install ${env.MAVEN_OPTS} ${extraArgs}", false)
          
      
    
    
  

or ?
btw, not sure we should keep MAVEN_OPTS for native ...

Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                maven.runMavenWithSubmarineSettings("clean install ${env.MAVEN_OPTS} ${extraArgs}", false)
          
          
            
                maven.runMavenWithSubmarineSettings("clean install ${extraArgs}", false)
          
      
    
    
  

MAVEN_OPTS env is taken automatically by Maven ;)
